message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me in the middle?

I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents the value I place on this product, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this offer reflects the true worth of what's being offered.
I'm still not sure I can go that high. I'd be willing to meet you at $14,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?
